## 判定leaflet for R包是否已经安装，如果没有安装，则进行安装
```{r}
if (!requireNamespace("leaflet", quietly = TRUE))
  install.packages("leaflet")

library(leaflet)
```

## 显示北京，并且设置弹出窗示例
```{r}
m <- leaflet()
at <- addTiles(m)
addMarkers(at,lng=116.391, lat=39.912, popup="这里是北京")
```
